title: Ticket #2921: regression - incorrect recovery in dagman
description:
When recovery occurs for jobs between termination and post script termination such as:

ULOG_JOB_TERMINATED <recovery> ULOG_POST_SCRIPT_TERMINATED

the state information isn't handled correctly in recovery. Although the jobs have post scripts and a ULOG_JOB_TERMINATED event, the jobs do not transition to running the post script. The result is you see the following in the dagman out file and a rescue is dumped:

02/28/12 09:14:32 ERROR: DAG finished but not all nodes are complete -- checking for a cycle... 02/28/12 09:14:32 ... ERROR: no cycle found; unknown error condition

What should happen is the post scripts should be run at the tail end of bootstrap (or before) and the recovery should work.
